reviewText:
Old ABC Weekend Special is quite nicely animated for a television show from the 80's, and the character design is very familiar - Rick Reinert Productions was a farmout for one of Disney's later Winnie the Pooh movies in the late 70s/early 80's, and some of the people later migrated to Disney TV, where they helped produce "Disney's Adventures of the Gummi Bears," "The New Adventuers of Winnie The Pooh," "Duck Tales" et al.
But that story...it's simplistic 1970's Government is Good hilarity GOLD which made this center-leftist roll his eyes and gag. Bleah! I'll watch it mute next time around.
